generated.title: GeneratedGapEnergy
generated.description: This is an autogenerated partial class definition of 'GapEnergy'

description*.en: "Gap Energy" is the difference in energy between the lowest level of conduction band and the highest level of valence band. It is an energy range in a solid where no electron states can exist.

title: GapEnergy
description: "Gap Energy" is the difference in energy between the lowest level of conduction band and the highest level of valence band. It is an energy range in a solid where no electron states can exist.
